duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform diagnostic activities and service/repair automotive systems according to company procedures.
Road test automobiles, perform inspections, and explain diagnosis/repairs to non-mechanical individuals.
Keep store management informed of mechanical repair problems and maintain proficiency in automotive diagnosis and repair techniques.
Maintain service center standards and compliance with safety policies and OSHA requirements.
Assist in training newly employed Vehicle Service Technicians and provide on-the-job guidance.

education_certification.credential: 3 years of automotive repair experience, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, or demonstrated skills via third party certificates/assessment
A.S.E. certification in at least 3 (three) of A1-A8 is preferred. Will accept equivalent external qualifications or training certifications.
Valid automobile driver’s license at all times
